feed.title: Pipilo Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Phanpy: 2025.03.12.4e6820d
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Increase global masto api timeout by @alexkrolick in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1037
  • Fix nodeinfo query on split-domain instances by @Drakulix in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1081

New Contributors

  • @alexkrolick made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1037
  • @Drakulix made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1081

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/compare/2025.01.26.24f03f5...2025.03.12.4e6820d

entry.title: New release for Phanpy: 2025.04.26.0d0fa92
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Show the emoji shortcode in statuses when hovering, like Mastodon's native's frontend does by @VirtualWolf in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1064

New Contributors

  • @VirtualWolf made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1064

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/compare/2025.03.22.85d964f...2025.04.26.0d0fa92

entry.title: New release for Phanpy: 2025.04.27.3534585
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added social.qrk.one to self-hosted instances by @kevquirk in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/557
  • Added phanpy.cz to self-hosted instances by @zkreml in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/561
  • fix: enable/disable boosts button logic by @coxde in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/584
  • Include domain when copying local user's handle by @graue in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/597
  • Fix overflow for the columns wrapper by @kizu in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/607
  • fix(shortcuts-settings): settingsJSON must be defined if note doesn't exist by @fhemberger in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/610
  • Filter out languages that aren't RFC5646-shaped by @illfygli in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/613
  • Update README.md by @Fastidious in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/616
  • add phanpy.social.tchncs.de deployment to readme by @verymilan in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/615
  • Configure linguist overrides for this repository by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/746
  • Add support for local instance posts by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/657
  • Fix invalid vote counts on single choice polls on certain MastoAPI implementations by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/767
  • Fix editing image descriptions by @graue in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/788
  • Do not save state between regex executions by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/855
  • Use the same logic as the main login button for the login tooltip in posts by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/856
  • Replace the current issue templates with the newer format, "Issue Forms" by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/867
  • Fix crash if a @username@twitter.com pseudo-mention is encountered by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/872
  • Allow pasting attachments on Akkoma / Pleroma instances by @Steffo99 in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/735
  • Update README.md: Added mastodon.world local install by @ruudschilders in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/891
  • Add my instance and sort list by @benharri in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/901
  • Support exclusive lists with GoToSocial 0.17 by @graue in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/817
  • Added phanpy.linuxusers.in to community deployments by @dhrm1k in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/970
  • Fix text expander not working correctly in lists by @kizu in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1003
  • Increase global masto api timeout by @alexkrolick in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1037
  • Fix nodeinfo query on split-domain instances by @Drakulix in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1081
  • Show the emoji shortcode in statuses when hovering, like Mastodon's native's frontend does by @VirtualWolf in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1064

New Contributors

  • @kevquirk made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/557
  • @zkreml made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/561
  • @coxde made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/584
  • @graue made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/597
  • @kizu made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/607
  • @fhemberger made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/610
  • @illfygli made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/613
  • @verymilan made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/615
  • @Steffo99 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/746
  • @ruudschilders made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/891
  • @benharri made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/901
  • @sorin-davidoi made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/938
  • @dhrm1k made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/970
  • @alexkrolick made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1037
  • @Drakulix made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1081
  • @VirtualWolf made their first contribution in https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/pull/1064

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cheeaun/phanpy/compare/2024.05.15.6976191...2025.04.27.3534585
